[文档]class CreditCertificateParentViewSet(GenericViewSet):
    """
    转让-获取授信信息:
            - get 获取待转让的信用凭证(父级凭证)信息
            - post 新建转让信用凭证，返回转让凭证的id
        - 注意：
            - 已作废的信用凭证不可转让
            - 不是正常持有的不可转让
            - 临近付款日不可转让
    """
    # x信-x信管理-x信转让审批
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageTransferPermission]
    serializer_class = CreditCertificateParentSerializer
    queryset = CreditCertificate.objects.all().order_by('id')
    lookup_url_kwarg = 'ppk'


[文档]    def get_object(self):
        """
        重写获取对象逻辑
        @return: 待转让信用凭证（父级凭证）
        """
        # 数据集接口
        queryset = self.filter_queryset(self.get_queryset())

        # 通过path参数获取对象
        lookup_url_kwarg = self.lookup_url_kwarg or self.lookup_field
        assert lookup_url_kwarg in self.kwargs, (
            'Expected view %s to be called with a URL keyword argument '
            'named "%s". Fix your URL conf, or set the `.lookup_field` '
            'attribute on the view correctly.' %
            (self.__class__.__name__, lookup_url_kwarg)
        )

        # 登录者企业身份校验,当前企业拥有的信用凭证才可以转让
        company_login = self.request.company
        filter_kwargs = {self.lookup_field: self.kwargs[lookup_url_kwarg], "company": company_login}
        obj = get_object_or_404(queryset, **filter_kwargs)

        # 检查对象权限
        self.check_object_permissions(self.request, obj)

        # 已作废的信用凭证不可转让
        if not obj.is_valid:
            raise NotAcceptable("信用凭证已作废！")

        # 不是正常持有的不可转让
        current_node = obj.creditcurrentnode.work_flow.code
        if not(current_node == "open_hold" or current_node == "transfer_complete"):
            raise NotAcceptable("当前信用凭证不可转让！")

        # 临近付款日不可转让
        today = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        if (obj.promise_pay_at - today).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            raise NotAcceptable("临近付款日不可转让")

        return obj



[文档]    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        get:获取待转让的信用凭证信息
        """
        instance = self.get_object()
        serializer = self.get_serializer(instance)
        return Response(serializer.data)



[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def create(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        post:
            - 新建转让信用凭证
            - 返回转让信用凭证的id
        """
        user_id = request.user.id

        serializer = CreditCertificateTransferBasicCreateSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)

        # 转让金额不能大于净额
        parent_cc = self.get_object()
        amount = serializer.validated_data['amount']
        if amount > parent_cc.net_amount:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"转让金额不能大于净额!")

        # 创建转让信用凭证
        business = Business.objects.get(name="transfer")
        number = CreditCertificate.generate_transfer_number(parent_cc)
        path = CreditCertificate.generate_path(parent_cc)
        transfer_cc = CreditCertificate.objects.create(
            review_status="creating",  # 信用凭证审核状态改为"创建中：creating"
            credit_id=parent_cc.credit.id,
            company_id=serializer.validated_data['company_id'],
            from_company_id=parent_cc.company.id,
            amount=serializer.validated_data['amount'],
            promise_pay_at=parent_cc.promise_pay_at,
            credit_certificate_receive_time_limit_id=serializer.validated_data['time_limit_id'],
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            number=number,
            business_id=business.id,
            path=path,
        )

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"要件上传:enclosure_upload"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="enclosure_upload")
        CreditCurrentNode.objects.create(
            credit_certificate_id=transfer_cc.id,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        # 创建"转让申请"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_application")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=transfer_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        data = CreditCertificateTransferBasicCreateSerializer(transfer_cc).data
        return Response(data, status=status.HTTP_201_CREATED)

[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        特殊处理:
            - 从"上传要件"自动回退到"申请转让"节点
            - 驳回状态中的转让金额占用【净额】，如果需要修改则需补回转让金额
        """
        transfer_cc = self.get_object()
        parent_cc = transfer_cc.parent_credit_certificate

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"转让申请:transfer_application"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_application")
        current_node = transfer_cc.creditcurrentnode
        current_node.work_flow = wf
        current_node.save()

        serializer = CreditCertificateTransferBasicRetrieveSerializer(transfer_cc)
        data = deepcopy(serializer.data)
        amount_old = transfer_cc.amount  # 修改前的转让金额（驳回状态中的转让金额占用【净额】，如果需要修改则需补回转让金额）
        available_quota = parent_cc.net_amount if transfer_cc.review_status == "creating" else parent_cc.net_amount + amount_old
        data.update({
            "balance_available": FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(available_quota),
        })
        return Response(data)



[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        user_id = request.user.id

        serializer = CreditCertificateTransferBasicCreateSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)

        # 转让金额不能大于净额
        transfer_cc = self.get_object()
        parent_cc = transfer_cc.parent_credit_certificate
        amount_old = parent_cc.amount  # 修改前的转让金额（创建中的转让金额，不占用可转金额）
        available_quota = parent_cc.net_amount if transfer_cc.review_status == "creating" else transfer_cc.net_amount + amount_old
        amount = serializer.validated_data['amount']  # 修改后的转让金额
        if amount > available_quota:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"转让金额不能大于净额!")

        # 更新转让信用凭证
        CreditCertificate.objects.filter(pk=transfer_cc.id).update(
            company_id=serializer.validated_data['company_id'],
            amount=serializer.validated_data['amount'],
            credit_certificate_receive_time_limit_id=serializer.validated_data['time_limit_id'],
            s1_user_id=user_id,
        )

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"要件上传:enclosure_upload"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="enclosure_upload")
        current_node = transfer_cc.creditcurrentnode
        current_node.work_flow = wf
        current_node.save()

        # 创建"转让申请"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_application")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=transfer_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        # 注意：当前的transfer_cc对象是旧对象，与最新数据库里更新的对象属性数据不一致,如果需要最新数据需要刷新对象
        transfer_cc.refresh_from_db()
        serializer = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(transfer_cc.credit_certificate_enclosures, many=True)
        data = {
            "amount": FenToYuanFloatField().to_representation(transfer_cc.amount),
            "list": serializer.data,
            "work_flow": transfer_cc.get_work_flow(),
            "id": transfer_cc.id,
        }
        return Response(data)



[文档]    def perform_destroy(self, instance):
        instance.is_valid = False
        instance.save()

[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def create(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        user_id = request.user.id

        # 校验支付验证码
        phone = request.user.phone
        code = request.data.pop("phone_code", "")
        if not code:
            raise ValidationError("请输入支付验证码！")
        result = validate_pay_code(phone, code)
        if result['status'] != "success":
            return Response(result)

        # 获取信用凭证
        transfer_cc = self.get_transfer_creditcertificate()

        # 信用凭证相关的合同要件操作增删改
        contracts = request.data.get('contracts')
        contracts_old = transfer_cc.credit_certificate_enclosures.all()
        contracts_old_id_set = set([co.id for co in contracts_old])
        contracts_create = []
        contracts_update = []
        cid_input_set = []
        contracts_total_fee = 0
        for contract in contracts:
            cces = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(data=contract)
            cces.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
            contracts_total_fee += cces.validated_data.get('contract_amount')
            cid = contract.get('id')
            if not cid:  # 新增要件儿
                cces.validated_data.update(credit_certificate=transfer_cc)
                contracts_create.append(CreditCertificateEnclosure(**cces.validated_data))
            elif cid in contracts_old_id_set:  # 更新的要件儿
                cid_input_set.append(cid)
                cce = contracts_old.get(id=cid)
                cce.contract_no = cces.validated_data.get('contract_no')
                cce.contract_amount = cces.validated_data.get('contract_amount')
                cce.contract_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('contract_enclosure')
                cce.invoice_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('invoice_enclosure')
                cce.other_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('other_enclosure')
                cce.contract_sign_at = cces.validated_data.get('contract_sign_at')
                contracts_update.append(cce)
            else:
                raise NotAcceptable(f"合同要件（id={cid}），不存在!")

        # 待删除的要件儿id
        contracts_delete_ids = contracts_old_id_set - set(cid_input_set)

        # 转让金额需小于等于累计合同金额
        if contracts_total_fee < transfer_cc.amount:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"转让金额需小于等于累计合同金额!")

        # 提交到数据库
        if contracts_create:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.bulk_create(contracts_create)
        if contracts_update:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.bulk_update(
                contracts_update,
                fields=['contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure',
                        'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure'],
            )
        if contracts_delete_ids:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(id__in=contracts_delete_ids).delete()

        # 信用凭证审核状态改为"审批中：reviewing"
        transfer_cc.review_status = "reviewing"
        transfer_cc.save()

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"转让审批:transfer_examine"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_examine")
        current_node = transfer_cc.creditcurrentnode
        current_node.work_flow = wf
        current_node.save()

        # 创建"要件上传"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="enclosure_upload")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=transfer_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        data = {
            "id": transfer_cc.id
        }
        return Response(data)

[文档]    @transaction.atomic
    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):

        user_id = request.user.id

        # 校验支付验证码
        phone = request.user.phone
        code = request.data.pop("phone_code", "")
        if not code:
            raise ValidationError("请输入支付验证码！")
        result = validate_pay_code(phone, code)
        if result['status'] != "success":
            return Response(result)

        # 第一步，校验数据：
        serializer = CreditCertificateTransferBasicCreateSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)

        # 转让金额不能大于净额
        transfer_cc = self.get_object()
        parent_cc = transfer_cc.parent_credit_certificate
        amount_old = parent_cc.amount  # 修改前的转让金额（创建中的转让金额，不占用可转金额）
        available_quota = parent_cc.net_amount if transfer_cc.review_status == "creating" else transfer_cc.net_amount + amount_old
        amount = serializer.validated_data['amount']  # 修改后的转让金额
        if amount > available_quota:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"转让金额不能大于净额!")

        # 第二步，数据校验，信用凭证相关的合同要件操作增删改
        contracts = request.data.get('contracts')
        contracts_old = transfer_cc.credit_certificate_enclosures.all()
        contracts_old_id_set = set([co.id for co in contracts_old])
        contracts_create = []
        contracts_update = []
        cid_input_set = []
        contracts_total_fee = 0
        for contract in contracts:
            cces = CreditCertificateEnclosureSerializer(data=contract)
            cces.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
            contracts_total_fee += cces.validated_data.get('contract_amount')
            cid = contract.get('id')
            if not cid:  # 新增要件儿
                cces.validated_data.update(credit_certificate=transfer_cc)
                contracts_create.append(CreditCertificateEnclosure(**cces.validated_data))
            elif cid in contracts_old_id_set:  # 更新的要件儿
                cid_input_set.append(cid)
                cce = contracts_old.get(id=cid)
                cce.contract_no = cces.validated_data.get('contract_no')
                cce.contract_amount = cces.validated_data.get('contract_amount')
                cce.contract_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('contract_enclosure')
                cce.invoice_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('invoice_enclosure')
                cce.other_enclosure = cces.validated_data.get('other_enclosure')
                cce.contract_sign_at = cces.validated_data.get('contract_sign_at')
                contracts_update.append(cce)
            else:
                raise NotAcceptable(f"合同要件（id={cid}），不存在!")

        # 待删除的要件儿id
        contracts_delete_ids = contracts_old_id_set - set(cid_input_set)

        # 转让金额需小于等于累计合同金额
        if contracts_total_fee < amount:
            raise NotAcceptable(f"转让金额需小于等于累计合同金额!")

        # 第一步，更新转让信用凭证
        CreditCertificate.objects.filter(pk=transfer_cc.id).update(
            review_status="reviewing",
            company_id=serializer.validated_data['company_id'],
            amount=serializer.validated_data['amount'],
            credit_certificate_receive_time_limit_id=serializer.validated_data['time_limit_id'],
            s1_user_id=user_id,
        )

        # 第二步，要件儿数据，提交到数据库
        if contracts_create:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.bulk_create(contracts_create)
        if contracts_update:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.bulk_update(
                contracts_update,
                fields=['contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure',
                        'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure'],
            )
        if contracts_delete_ids:
            CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(id__in=contracts_delete_ids).delete()

        # 当前工作流节点更新为"转让审批:transfer_examine"
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_examine")
        current_node = transfer_cc.creditcurrentnode
        current_node.work_flow = wf
        current_node.save()

        # 创建"转让申请"审核日志
        now = datetime.datetime.now()
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="transfer_application")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=transfer_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        # 创建"要件上传"审核日志
        wf = WorkFlow.objects.get(code="enclosure_upload")
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            result="pass",
            opinion="",
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=now,
            s1_user_id=user_id,
            data_id=transfer_cc.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            node=wf.title,
            work_flow=wf,
        )

        data = {
            "id": transfer_cc.id
        }
        return Response(data)
